children.subject: When is the last day to add or drop classes without it showing up on transcript?

history.content:
This is a reminder of upcoming add/drop deadlines for Fall 2019.

Early Drop Deadline

Classes with an Early Drop Deadline should be dropped by Friday, 9/6/19 at 11:59 PM.

Deadline to Add/Drop without Late fees

Class Drop Deadline without a late fee is 9/6/19 at 11:59 PM

Class Add Deadline without a late fee is 9/13/19 at 11:59 PM

Swap Deadlines

Undergraduate Deadline to Add/Drop/Swap is 9/18/19 at 11:59PM.

Graduate Deadline to Add/Drop/Swap is 9/27/19 at 11:59PM.

Swap actions are adds and drops. Late add/drop fees will apply to swaps.

Add/Drop Deadlines can be found in the current Student Enrollment Calendar: https://registrar.berkeley.edu/calendar
